title: Astra to raise up to $65 million in stock sale
summary: Faced with dwindling cash and a stock delisting, Astra Space announced plans July 10 to perform a reverse split of its stock and sell up to $65 million of it.

title: Astra plans a reverse stock split, seeks to raise up to $65 million in offering
summary: Spacecraft engine manufacturer and small rocket builder Astra plans to conduct a reverse stock split at a 1-to-15 ratio, the company disclosed in a securities filing on Monday

title: Voyager Space deepens India ties for commercial space station plans
summary: Voyager Space is considering using India’s proposed Gaganyaan crewed spacecraft to serve the commercial space station it aims to be operating by the end of the decade.

title: Space Force juggles roles as warrior and protector of space environment
summary: In an era of great power competition and increasing global reliance on space-based assets, the U.S. military is trying to harmonize seemingly competing demands for security and sustainability. As a […]

title: BREAKING! NASA Awards Axiom Space New Contract For Next-Gen ISS Spacesuits
summary: Axiom Space has been awarded a contract by NASA to modify its next-generation Artemis III lunar spacesuit design to enhance NASA's spacewalking capabilities on the ISS.

title: NASA Expands Options for Spacewalking, Moonwalking Suits, Services
summary: NASA has awarded Axiom Space and Collins Aerospace task orders under existing contracts to advance spacewalking capabilities in low Earth orbit, as well as moonwalking services for Artemis missions.

title: Benchmark raises $33 million in Series B round
summary: With the money raised, Benchmark plans to shift its focus from propulsion system research and development to manufacturing and testing.

title: AI, quantum and nuclear technologies are key to Lockheed Martin’s vision for Space 2050
summary: Through a project called Destination: Space 2050, Lockheed Martin executives are exploring, for example, how AI could assist scientific exploration of locations where communications with remote sensors would be disrupted by high latency.

title: Astronomers solve mystery of how a mirror-like planet formed so close to its star
summary: The atmosphere is super-saturated with silicate and metal vapors.

title: Can space governance keep up with space sustainability?
summary: It is not uncommon to be faced with a problem but struggle to find a solution. In the case of space sustainability, as low Earth orbit fills with both active […]
